author: manoj2994
body: Hi i have downloaded powershell 6.2 package for my windows 7 sp 1 version.and i ensured that wmf 5.1,.net core and c runtime also installed when i open powershell 6.2 application the window opens and closes immediately and iam sure installed can someone please help me on this

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @manoj2994 Please update the issue description. Perhaps Google translate helps you.

comments.author: manoj2994
comments.body: @isazonov may be my english is not good anyway thanks. i found the solution.its just missing of  dotnet core dependency packages for win 7 .its working now

title: Powershell 6.2 facing issue on opening my application
